content: 10st s ch1 turn your work decrease and single_crochet in the next 8st s then decrease in the last 2st s of the row row 15 8st s ch1 turn your work decrease and single_crochet in the next 6st s then decrease in the last 2st s of the row row 16 6st s ch1 turn your work decrease and single_crochet in the next 4st s then decrease in the last 2st s of the row row 17 3st s ch1 turn your work decrease in every 2 next st s cut the thread and fasten of attach yarn in marked stitch of row 12 and repeat row 13 to 17 to effectively block out light make a second body mask ----------------------------------------connecting the 2 masks and making frills------------------------------------------- place the two pieces together with the edges aligned insert your hook through the first st of both pieces aligning them st by st and single_crochet repeat along the edge of the mask until you reach the first st and slip_stitch enclosing the remaining straps of the edges between both masks page 2 instructions ch1 and do 3sc s +1ch in every st around the mask to make the frills then slip_stitch in the first st of the round ------------------------------------------------------band of the mask--------------------------------------------------------- keep a long tail and do a slip knot then ch7 row1 6st s skip a st and single_crochet in the next 6st s row2 6st s ch1 and do a single_crochet in the back loop of the next 6st s row 3 - row 62 6st s repeat row 2 60 times* for a head circumference of 58cm keep a long thread and fasten_off place the ends of the band with the edge st s of row 6 to 11 in the body mask before the frills using a needle and with the kept long threads sew the band ends to the mask insert the needle from one piece to the other along the 6 stitches at the end of the band looping around to create a tight seam *for a hc of 57 do 60rows for a hc of 56 do 58rows reduce 2rows for every 1cm smaller hc thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed making it as much as i enjoyed designing it may it bring you comfort restful sleep and beautiful dreams sweet dreams and happy crafting
